name: Mystery Okenia
description:
To begin, I just want to say that I live in Russia, and I do not know much English

The game is in active development.

Very briefly about the game and history: The game takes place on a distant planet, "Okenia". on the planet, you can not remember your name and what you were before.
This planet is unique, because it is completely covered by a deep ocean.
The player is given to come up with a name and choose a class (each class its own unique abilities and items). You will survive at great depths. Grow food. Defense of these inhabitants of this planet. But the most important enemies, it is not scary monsters and animals, this oxygen-! Without oxygen, you can not stretch and minutes in the water. In general the game is hardcore !!!!!! 1 !!!

I said you do not even 1/100 of history, because what is the point to play, knowing "that as a yes."

At this point in the game only Russian localization, but the next update will be added to the English version

Control:

  • Float - shift
  • Immersion - Ctrl
  • Go forward / backward - "W" / "S"
  • The action (depending on the subject), - the left mouse button
  • Map - "I"
  • Throw object - "Q")
  • Computer - "Q" Control Computer arrows (up, down and to the right (action))

I'm the only developer, so please support me.

Express your suggestions.

Version 0.1 pre-alpha

And more ..., vodka, balalaika, matryoshka :)

: D
